meanings: (사물을) gather, (수집하다) collect, (자료 등을) amass, (오랜 기간에 걸쳐) accumulate
실용회화-취미를 물을 때-기본대화 Since I was fifteen years old.

meanings.meaning: an appeal to raise much-needed cash

vlive.korean: 이제 포도알 모으기에 의욕이 좀 더 생기셨나요? Now you're more enthusiastic to collect stickers? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.1
vlive.english: Now you're more enthusiastic to collect stickers?

vlive.korean: [아이고 구독자 모으기 힘들어] [휴~] 됐어! [Gee, it's hard to get subscribers] [Phew] Done! 듣기 View video EXID 혜린의 매일삽질 #skyTV : 떼리니가 보따 선생님에게 유튜브를 배워봤삽 [EXID 혜린의 매일삽질] 1회
vlive.english: [Gee, it's hard to get subscribers] [Phew] Done!

vlive.korean: 저희가 100명 모으기를 하는데... We are holding the event for 100 people... 듣기 View video JJHOLICMEDIA : [마스크/MASC] 두 번째 VLIVE!
vlive.english: We are holding the event for 100 people...

vlive.korean: 이거 다 모으기 진짜 힘들었을 거야. It must have been hard to get all of the props. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : ToppDogg - 탑독 '탑독 하태핫해!!'
vlive.english: It must have been hard to get all of the props.

vlive.korean: 대현이가 한창 혼자 살기 시작하면서 모으기 시작했죠. Daehyun started colleting things when he moved out. 듣기 View video B.A.P : B.A.P Vring U (B.A.P 2000일 with BABY)
vlive.english: Daehyun started colleting things when he moved out.

examples.korean: an appeal to raise much-needed cash 발음듣기 대단히 필요한 현금을 모으기 위한 호소 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: an appeal to raise much-needed cash 발음

examples.korean: He set about raising an army. 발음듣기 그는 군대를 모으기[편성하기] 시작했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He set about raising an army. 발음

examples.korean: She has been wrestling to raise the money all year. 발음듣기 그녀는 그 돈을 모으기 위해 한 해 내내 씨름을 하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She has been wrestling to raise the money all year. 발음

examples.korean: I’ve got all the information together but it still needs knocking into shape. 발음듣기 내가 그 정보들을 다 모으기는 했지만 아직 제대로 정리는 못 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ve got all the information together but it still needs knocking into shape. 발음

examples.korean: He is fond of collecting rare, highly prized wine. 발음듣기 그는 드물고 높이 평가되는 와인 모으기를 좋아한다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: He is fond of collecting rare, highly prized wine. 발음
